author: junphine <junphine@126.com>
description: An ignite base in-memory, JavaScript mock for the Firebase Web API
name: firebase-ignite

scripts.dist: yarn run dist:build && yarn run dist:uglify
scripts.dist:build: yarn run dist:clean && yarn run dist:copy && tsc -p tsconfig-dist.json && browserify dist/index.js -s firebaseIgnite  -o bundles/firebase-ignite.umd.js
scripts.dist:copy: cpy source/lodash.* dist/ && cpy source/firebase-interfaces.* dist/
scripts.dist:clean: rimraf dist && rimraf bundles/firebase-ignite.* && mkdirp bundles
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run test && yarn run dist
scripts.test: yarn run lint && yarn run test:build && yarn run test:mocha && yarn run test:karma
scripts.test:build: yarn run test:clean && yarn run test:copy && tsc -p tsconfig.json && browserify build/index-spec.js -s firebaseIgniteTest -o bundles/firebase-ignite-test.umd.js
scripts.test:clean: rimraf build && rimraf bundles/firebase-ignite-test.* && mkdirp bundles
